function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Static data collection in simulation model","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of multiple queues in simulation model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of dynamic real-time adaptation in simulation models","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simulation models spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of simulation models in healthcare for testing alternate
